scripts.infra:up: bash -lc 'if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up -d; else echo "Docker non presente: uso servizi locali (Postgres/Redis)"; echo "Verifica porte 5432/6379:"; (command -v ss >/dev/null 2>&1 && ss -ltn | grep -E ":(5432|6379)\\s" || true); fi'
scripts.infra:down: bash -lc 'if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml down; else echo "Docker non presente: nessun compose da fermare (servizi locali gestiti dal sistema)"; fi'
scripts.infra:logs: bash -lc 'if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f; else echo "Docker non presente: usa journalctl/systemctl per i servizi locali (postgres/redis)"; fi'
scripts.infra:check: bash -lc 'echo "Checking local infra..."; (command -v ss >/dev/null 2>&1 && ss -ltn | grep -E ":(4010|5432|6379)\\s" || true)'
